name: Escape the Witch Trials
description:
You are a witch who has accidently unleashed giant spiders and the townsfolk are pretty mad about it.  Now  you must escape  through the maze-like town to get away from your doom. (this is a 5-10 min game)

Dev's Note:

Please don't come after me, this is my first game. Yes, I  am aware  how unfinished this game is and how  the enemies don't even face you. I am working on it and I'm also planning to add more to the game in the near future.
